item.title: Sudoku in Python
item.description: What is sudoku? Sudoku is a 81 square game, whereing all you need to do is just enter a single digit number(1-9)(and not 0 Computer Nerds know why I said this :) ) in a box. 2 - 7 |9 - 5 |- 8 1 8 - 3 |7 - 6 |- 4 9 4 - 1 |8 - 3 |- 7 6 ------+------+------ - - - |4 - 8 |1 9 2 3 8 4 |1 9 2 |- - - - - - |- - - |4 3 8 ------+------+------ - - - |- 7 - |8 - 5 9 - 5 |- 8 - |7 - 4 7 - 8 |- 6 - |9 - 3 Sounds easy right?
